amendment.description: Amendment increases and decreases by $10,000,000 funding to support greater diversity in the pool of diabetes research professionals and patients participating in clinical trials.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase and decrease by $10,000,000 funding to support greater diversity in the pool of diabetes research professionals and patients participating in clinical trials.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 317 - 105 (Roll no. 260).

action.text: Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
